title: Bro on the Go | Sal Miccio
itunes:title: Bro on the Go | Sal Miccio
description:
Our first Bro on the Go! Brooke sits down with her younger brother, Sal, while on vacation in Aruba with the fam! Brooke & Sal discuss their relationship growing up until now, and they answer your questions!

NEW MERCH HERE: https://shop.podcastone.com/collections/gals-on-the-go

channels on YouTube!

Brooke Miccio 
Danielle Carolan

@daniellecarolan @brookemiccio Talk to you guys next Wednesday and for the next episode!
